about_the_game:
Burning Sword: Death Sun immerses players into an ancient martial world, where Zhang Yìxian, a top-ranked sword master, seeks to avenge his fallen master in a seamless blend of challenging soul-like gameplay and fluid hack-and-slash action, creating a uniquely captivating experience unlike any other.

Story
Amid an era of chaos and turmoil, marked by oppression and brutality, various martial sects expanded their dominion and seized control over the entire kingdom. In the relentless pursuit of dominance, martial masters fight and kill anyone who gets in their way. Zhang Yìxian, leader of the Crimson Dust Demon Sect, emerges from the depths of hell with a singular purpose to take revenge on the supreme ruler, Gao Tian Qi. An endless battle between two formidable martial masters, but only one shall prevail.



Wuxia Action Combat
Encounter diverse combat scenarios and master your martial arts skills through secret techniques and inner strength. Empower yourself with the Burning Sword to maintain your stance and amplify your attacks, unleashing even greater power.



Martial Experts Fight
Duels with martial masters from across the martial world. You must utilize physical strength, inner strength, and sect's techniques to conquer each master you face along the way.



Visual
Enter the world of martial arts filled with the classic artistry of Chinese wuxia movies. Utilize sword techniques, palm strikes, and inner strength. Powered by Unreal Engine 5.

content_descriptors.notes:
Violence and Blood: The gameplay will feature intense violence and bloodshed as part of the action. This can involve graphic depictions of combat, injuries, and fatalities.

Ancient Chinese Culture: The game's portrayal of ancient Chinese culture might include accurate depictions of alcohol and drugs that were part of historical practices. Customers should be prepared to encounter these elements in the context of the game's setting.

Wuxia Themes: Wuxia stories often involve themes of heroism, honor, loyalty, and personal growth. However, they can also explore complex moral dilemmas and darker aspects of human nature. Customers should be open to engaging with these themes as part of the game's narrative.

short_description: Burning Sword: Death Sun is a Wuxia hack n' slash game. Play as the great fighter, Zhāng Yì Xiàn, who seeks revenge for the death of his family at the hands of China's powerful Gāo Tiān Qí. Dive into a tale of revenge, redemption, martial arts, and intense swordplay.
